TalentsTiers.Name: Relentless Strikes
TalentsTiers.Description: Your finishing moves have a [@value]% chance per combo point to restore [@value2] energy.

TalentsTiers.Name: Master of Deception
TalentsTiers.Description: Reduces the chance enemies have to detect you while in Stealth mode.[@value]
PointValues: More effective than Master of Deception (Rank 1).
More effective than Master of Deception (Rank 2).
More effective than Master of Deception (Rank 3).
More effective than Master of Deception (Rank 4).

TalentsTiers.Name: Opportunity
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the damage dealt with your Backstab, Mutilate, Garrote, and Ambush abilities by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Sleight of Hand
TalentsTiers.Description: Reduces the chance you are critically hit by melee and ranged attacks by [@value]% and increases the threat reduction of your Feint ability by [@value2]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Dirty Tricks
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the range of your Blind and Sap abilities by [@value] yards and reduces the energy cost of your Blind and Sap abilities by [@value2]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Camouflage
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases your speed while stealthed by [@value]% and reduces the cooldown of your Stealth ability by [@value2] sec.

TalentsTiers.Name: Elusiveness
TalentsTiers.Description: Reduces the cooldown of your Vanish and Blind abilities by [@value] sec. and your Cloak of Shadows ability by [@value2] sec.

TalentsTiers.Name: Ghostly Strike
TalentsTiers.Description:
40 Energy
5 yds

Instant
20 sec cooldown
A strike that deals 125% weapon damage (180% if a dagger is equipped) and increases your chance to dodge by 15% for 7 sec. Awards 1 combo point.

TalentsTiers.Name: Serrated Blades
TalentsTiers.Description: Causes your attacks to ignore [@value]% of your target's Armor and increases the damage dealt by your Rupture ability by [@value2]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Setup
TalentsTiers.Description: Gives you a [@value]% chance to add a combo point to your target after dodging their attack or fully resisting one of their spells. This cannot happen more than once per second.

TalentsTiers.Name: Initiative
TalentsTiers.Description: Gives you a [@value]% chance to add an additional combo point to your target when using your Ambush, Garrote, or Cheap Shot ability.

TalentsTiers.Name: Improved Ambush
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the critical strike chance of your Ambush ability by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Heightened Senses
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases your Stealth detection and reduces the chance you are hit by spells and ranged attacks by [@value]%.[@value2]

TalentsTiers.Name: Preparation
TalentsTiers.Description:
Instant
8 min cooldown

When activated, this ability immediately finishes the cooldown on your Evasion, Sprint, Vanish, Cold Blood and Shadowstep abilities. This ability is usable while shapeshifted.

TalentsTiers.Name: Dirty Deeds
TalentsTiers.Description: Reduces the Energy Cost of your Cheap Shot and Garrote abilities by [@value]. Additionally, your Rogue specials cause [@value2]% more damage against targets below [@value3]% health.

TalentsTiers.Name: Hemorrhage
TalentsTiers.Description:
35 Energy
5 yds

Instant
An instant strike that deals 100% weapon damage (145% if a dagger is equipped) (80% if a two-hander is equipped) and causes the target to hemorrhage, increasing any Physical damage dealt to the target by up to 13. Lasts 10 charges or 15 sec. Awards 1 combo point.

Talent Has Trainable Ranks

TalentsTiers.Name: Master of Subtlety
TalentsTiers.Description: Attacks made while stealthed and for [@value] seconds after breaking stealth cause an additional [@value2]% damage.

TalentsTiers.Name: Deadliness
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases your Attack Power by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Enveloping Shadows
TalentsTiers.Description: Reduces the damage taken by area of effect attacks by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Premeditation
TalentsTiers.Description:
30 yd range
Instant
20 sec cooldown

Requires Stealth
When used, adds 2 combo points to your target. You must add to or use those combo points within 20 sec or the combo points are lost. This ability is usable while shapeshifted.

TalentsTiers.Name: Cheat Death
TalentsTiers.Description: You have a [@value]% chance that an attack which would otherwise kill you will instead reduce you to [@value2]% of your maximum health. In addition, all damage taken will be reduced by up to [@value3]% for [@value4] sec (modified by resilience). This effect cannot occur more than once per minute.

TalentsTiers.Name: Sinister Calling
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases your total Agility by [@value]% and increases the percentage damage bonus of Backstab and Hemorrhage by an additional [@value2]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Waylay
TalentsTiers.Description: Your Ambush critical hits have a [@value]% chance to unbalance a target reducing the target's melee and ranged attack speed by [@value2]%, movement speed by [@value3]% for [@value4] sec.

TalentsTiers.Name: Honor Among Thieves
TalentsTiers.Description: When anyone in your group critically hits with a damage or healing spell or ability, you have a [@value]% chance to gain a combo point on your current target. This effect cannot occur more than once every second.

TalentsTiers.Name: Shadowstep
TalentsTiers.Description:
10 Energy
25 yds

Instant
30 sec cooldown
Attempts to step through the shadows and reappear behind your enemy and increases movement speed by 70% for 3 sec. The damage of your next Rogue ability is increased by 20% and the threat caused is reduced by 50%. Lasts 10 sec. This ability is usable while shapeshifted.

TalentsTiers.Name: Filthy Tricks
TalentsTiers.Description: Reduces the cooldown by [@value] sec and the energy cost by [@value2] of your Tricks of the Trade, Distract and Shadowstep abilities and reduces the cooldown of Preparation by [@value3] min.

TalentsTiers.Name: Slaughter from the Shadows
TalentsTiers.Description: Reduces the energy cost of your Backstab and Ambush abilities by [@value] and the energy cost of your Hemorrhage by [@value2], and increases all physical and nature damage done by [@value3]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Shadow Dance
TalentsTiers.Description:
60 sec Cooldown
Enter the Shadow Dance for 6 sec, allowing the use of Sap, Garrotte, Ambush, Cheap Shot, Premeditation, Pickpocket and Disarm Trap regardless of being stealthed.
